122.content:
There are many willing long pigs in the world, and they all have their unique reasons and desires of why they want to be eaten.

The first two on the menu are professional women who have made life changing decisions. But turning a fantasy of being eaten into reality isn't always easy.

Police Woman Rebecca Jones had joined the police force to protect and serve, but at the age of 24 she already feels burned out. No more can she put up with the abuse and ingratitude of the public. She has thought about it and the only time she has actually felt alive was when she was in plain clothes trying to entrap a serial cannibal.

Rebecca knows now that she missed a perfect opportunity to escape this boring life.

But he's now in jail and Rebecca is back in uniform, patrolling the dark city streets. Her fantasy is to find another cannibal and this time she wants to be his victim. To feel alive once more .

Professor Karen Khan has reached the glass ceiling and knows that she will never make it to the top. Her ambition thwarted by men scared of her and her interest in the seedier parts of society.

Her research into the strange cults and fetishes of the dark net brought her notoriety and stoked her own fantasies. But her academic research isn't enough. Karen wants to know how it feels to be meat, to be used, abused and consumed. To be valued only as a slab of meat.

But Karen might not be alone in this fantasy as she has inspired some of her more dedicated students to follow her path.

1221.content:
Policewoman Rebecca Jones
Rebecca is a conscientious officer who does her very best to be a model police officer. But despite her efforts her looks are held against her. She has never taken advantage of her beauty to get ahead and has turned down numerous offers from her superiors.

Now she has deliberately chosen a career path that confuses family, friends and colleagues alike.

Choosing to patrol the city streets is no way to get noticed and obtain promotion but it is a chance to full fill her desire, if she can only find a willing cannibal.


Natalya Yurlov is the first daughter of Russian émigré and joined the police to establish her credentials as a loyal citizen. But after years of being focused purely on her career and professional standing her world was transformed when she realised that she was descended from a long line of cannibals who had escaped justice for generations.

Now she has decided to accept the guilt of her ancestors and make herself a victim of the crimes her family were guilty off. Now all she needs to do is find a cannibal willing to kill and eat a beautiful Russian policewoman.

12211.content:
At the end of a long patrol Rebecca's feet were hurting.

Unlike some of her fellow officers she preferred to patrol her beet on foot rather than sit in a car waiting for something to be reported. This way she heard about things that didn't seem serious enough for the public to phone it in or was screened out by the dispatchers.

Tonight she had heard tales of strange noises near the local rest home. It could just be a bunch of kids playing about in the woods that backed onto the home or it might be more interesting. More interesting to Rebecca Jones because a number of missing women seemed to have some connection to the home.

But she'd also been told by an old homeless lag that he'd recognised an 'odd' character from his time in the forces. This was a man who had, if rumour was to believed, been discharged for collecting and allegedly eating parts of fallen enemy soldiers and civilians.

All in all it had been a good shift, but she wasn't sure if she had the energy to investigate further tonight.
